document_data.mainbody:
ount Fisfnilt was a noble from Toril, who lived some years before the late 14 century DR.
Count Fisfnilts name went down in history in association with a ring of human influence. Sometime before the , Count Fisfnilt was attempting to find a "suitable" bride for his son Ewnin, who rejected countless women from across Faer√ªn for not meeting his standards. After Count grew exhausted with his progeny, he ordered a court wizard to create a ring of human influence. The ring was gifted to a certain woman of great influence in a large nation. Ewnin fell in love with the woman, and they wed three weeks later.
